CustomField.description: Determines async execution strategy. Multi Queueable - process will be use multiple Queueable jobs to process requests (can be configured in Async Job Settings) Direct - process will be executed synchronously in Platform Event trigger (use it only for simple logic) Future - process will be executed in Salesforce Future method Queueable - process will be executed in Salesforce Queueable Batch - process will be executed in Salesforce Batch Custom - please provide a custom execution strategy name
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines async execution strategy. Multi Queueable - process will be use multiple Queueable jobs to process requests (can be configured in Async Job Settings) Direct - process will be executed synchronously in Platform Event trigger (use it only for simple logic) Future - process will be executed in Salesforce Future method Queueable - process will be executed in Salesforce Queueable Batch - process will be executed in Salesforce Batch Custom - please provide a custom execution strategy name
CustomField.label: Async Strategy
